00038 #ifndef LIBPMEMOBJ_DESTROYER_HPP
00039 #define LIBPMEMOBJ_DESTROYER_HPP
00040 
00041 #include <stddef.h>
00042 
00043 #include "libpmemobj++/detail/array_traits.hpp"
00044 
00045 namespace nvml
00046 {
00047 
00048 namespace detail
00049 {
00050 
00051 /*
00052  * Template for checking if T is not an array.
00053  */
00054 template <typename T>
00055 struct if_not_array {
00056         typedef T type;
00057 };
00058 
00059 /*
00060  * Template for checking if T is not an array.
00061  */
00062 template <typename T>
00063 struct if_not_array<T[]>;
00064 
00065 /*
00066  * Template for checking if T is not an array.
00067  */
00068 template <typename T, size_t N>
00069 struct if_not_array<T[N]>;
00070 
00071 /*
00072  * Template for checking if T is an array.
00073  */
00074 template <typename T>
00075 struct if_size_array;
00076 
00077 /*
00078  * Template for checking if T is an array.
00079  */
00080 template <typename T>
00081 struct if_size_array<T[]>;
00082 
00083 /*
00084  * Template for checking if T is an array.
00085  */
00086 template <typename T, size_t N>
00087 struct if_size_array<T[N]> {
00088         typedef T type[N];
00089 };
00090 
00091 /*
00092  * Calls object's constructor.
00093  */
00094 template <typename T>
00095 void
00096 create(typename if_not_array<T>::type *args)
00097 {
00098         ::new (args) T();
00099 }
00100 
00101 /*
00102  * Recursively calls array's elements' constructors.
00103  */
00104 template <typename T>
00105 void
00106 create(typename if_size_array<T>::type *args)
00107 {
00108         typedef typename detail::pp_array_type<T>::type I;
00109         enum { N = pp_array_elems<T>::elems };
00110 
00111         for (std::size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i)
00112                 create<I>(&(*args)[i]);
00113 }
00114 
00115 /*
00116  * Calls object's destructor.
00117  */
00118 template <typename T>
00119 void
00120 destroy(typename if_not_array<T>::type &arg)
00121 {
00122         arg.~T();
00123 }
00124 
00125 /*
00126  * Recursively calls array's elements' destructors.
00127  */
00128 template <typename T>
00129 void
00130 destroy(typename if_size_array<T>::type &arg)
00131 {
00132         typedef typename detail::pp_array_type<T>::type I;
00133         enum { N = pp_array_elems<T>::elems };
00134 
00135         for (std::size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i)
00136                 destroy<I>(arg[N - 1 - i]);
00137 }
00138 
00139 } /* namespace detail */
00140 
00141 } /* namespace nvml */
00142 
00143 #endif /* LIBPMEMOBJ_DESTROYER_HPP */
